title: Futatsuboshi Kudou Rikigaku Kenkyuujo
original_name: 二ツ星駆動力学研究所
sinopse: The manga artist Kentarou joins a group of adults as they return to the revival of a childhood fad—The Mini 4WD. As he's dragged around by the members of the force-fully created Mini 4WD team "Twin Stars Mechanomotive Force Laboratory," he comes to awaken to the joys of "All out play"...
